mapper.select: SELECT a.id, project_id, module_id, project_name, module_name, interface_name, url, path, method, param_type, a.creator, a.description, a.create_time, a.modify_time FROM mutest.interface_list a JOIN mutest.interface_module b ON a.module_id = b.id JOIN mutest.interface_project c ON b.project_id = c.id ORDER BY project_id,module_id

SELECT a.id, project_id, module_id, project_name, module_name, interface_name, url, path, method, param_type, a.description, a.create_time, a.modify_time FROM mutest.interface_list a JOIN mutest.interface_module b ON a.module_id = b.id JOIN mutest.interface_project c ON b.project_id = c.id
and project_name = #{projectName} and module_name = #{moduleName} and interface_name like concat('%', #{interfaceName}, '%')

mapper.update: UPDATE mutest.interface_list SET module_id = #{moduleId}, interface_name = #{interfaceName}, path = #{path}, param_type = #{paramType}, method = #{method}, description = #{description} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mutest.interface_list a JOIN mutest.interface_module b ON a.module_id = b.id JOIN mutest.interface_project c on b.project_id =c.id WHERE project_name=#{projectName} AND interface_name=#{interfaceName} OR path=#{path}

SELECT a.id FROM mutest.interface_list a LEFT JOIN mutest.interface_module b ON a.module_id = b.id LEFT JOIN mutest.interface_project c ON b.project_id = c.id WHERE project_name = #{projectName} AND module_name = #{moduleName} AND interface_name = #{interfaceName} LIMIT 1
